data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Strawberry Hill 15m, Oregon, USA (SH15XX)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Strawberry Hill 15m, Oregon, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using a HOBO U22 Water Temp Pro V2 (Onset Computer Corp. U22-001) beginning 2010-06-21. The instrument depth was 014 meters, in an overall water depth of 15 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
